price: 61. Waxay yidhaahdeen: “Keena oo soo hor joojiya dadka si ay ugu arkaan indhahooda bal inay ku markahaati furaan17?.”
arabic: قَالُواْ فَأۡتُواْ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَدُونَ
footnotes: 17. Wuxuu sidoo kale macnaha u dhici karaa: si ay markhaati iyo goob joog uga ahaadaan waxa lagu dhigo oo ciqaab ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū fatū bihi ʿalā aʿyuni al-nāsi laʿallahum yashhadūna
